title: Date, year, week conversion
text: default functions returns isoyear isoweek today.
code: date_to_isoyear_c() #> [1] "2025" date_to_isoyear_n() #> [1] 2025 date_to_isoweek_c() #> [1] "44" date_to_isoweek_n() #> [1] 44 # provide a date date_to_isoyear_c('2021-01-01') #> [1] "2020" date_to_isoyear_n('2021-01-01') #> [1] 2020 date_to_isoweek_c('2021-01-01') #> [1] "53" date_to_isoweek_n('2021-01-01') #> [1] 53 date_to_isoyearweek_c('2021-08-11') #> [1] "2021-32"

what: Get isoyear/isoweek from a isoyearweek string
title: Date, year, week conversion
text: list isoyearweek can accessed following way.

title: Authors and Citation
text: package proudly brought : Chi Zhang. Author. Richard Aubrey White. Author, maintainer. . Copyright holder. See changelog contributors. 🙏

title: Authors and Citation
text: Zhang C, White RA (2025). cstime: Date Time Functions Public Health Purposes. R package version 2025.10.29, https://www.csids./cstime/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {cstime: Date and Time Functions for Public Health Purposes},   author = {Chi Zhang and Richard Aubrey White},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 2025.10.29},   url = {https://www.csids.no/cstime/}, }

title: Date and Time Functions for Public Health Purposes
text: cstime provides date time functions public health purposes. cstime provides convenient consistent conversion isoyear isoweek calyear season week addition, cstime provides calendar data reference. Read introduction vignette run help(package="cstime").

title: Date and Time Functions for Public Health Purposes
text: csverse set R packages developed help solve problems frequently occur performing disease surveillance.
code: install.packages("attrib") install.packages("cs9") install.packages("csalert") install.packages("csdata") install.packages("csdb") install.packages("csmaps") install.packages("csstyle") install.packages("cstidy") install.packages("cstime") install.packages("csutil") install.packages("org") install.packages("plnr")

title: Date -> calmonth (character) — date_to_calmonth_c
code: date_to_calmonth_c(x = lubridate::today())  # Default S3 method date_to_calmonth_c(x)  # S3 method for class 'character' date_to_calmonth_c(x = lubridate::today())  # S3 method for class 'Date' date_to_calmonth_c(x = lubridate::today())

text: date Date. day_of_week Integer. 1 = Monday, 7 = Sunday mon_to_fri Integer. 1 Monday Friday, 0 Saturday Sunday sat_to_sun Integer. 1 Saturday Sunday, 0 Monday Friday public_holiday Integer. 1 public holiday (helligdag), 0 public holiday freeday Integer. 1 public holiday (helligdag) sat_to_sun==1, 0 otherwise workday Integer. 1 freeday==0, 0 freeday==1

Version 2025.10.13
text: CRAN release: 2025-10-14 Seasons now start week 35.

title: Version 2023.5.3
text: CRAN release: 2023-05-15 Inclusion now_c gives current time character format.

title: Version 2023.4.26
text: Uses binary searches improve speed date conversions.
